mapper.insert: INSERT INTO timu(tmname, tmtype, optionA, optionB, optionC, optionD, answer, tmscore) VALUES (${tmname}, ${tmtype}, ${optionA}, ${optionB}, ${optionC}, ${optionD}, ${answer}, ${tmscore})
mapper.update: UPDATE timu SET tmname=${tmname}, tmtype=${tmtype}, optionA=${optionA}, optionB=${optionB}, optionC=${optionC}, optionD=${optionD}, answer=${answer}, tmscore=${tmscore} where tmid = ${tmid}
